          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_64045420ff9b0d1f38932aca42d54db7459daff0</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Deamination of amino acids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Desaminierung der Aminosäuren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Désamination des acides aminés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deamination dos aminos-ácido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deaminazione degli amminoacidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Deamination των αμινοξέων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Deamination de aminoácidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how amino acids are deaminated, removing the amine group and converting it first to ammonia and then to urea through the ornithine cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amino acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deamination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ornithine cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">protein metabolism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">urea</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Aminosäuren deaminated
sind, die Amingruppe löschen und zuerst sie in Ammoniak und dann in 
Harnstoff durch die Ornithinschleife umwandeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les acides 
aminés sont deaminated, retirant le groupe d'amine et le 
convertissant d'abord en ammoniaque et puis en urée pendant le cycle 
d'ornithine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os aminos-ácido 
são deaminated, removendo o grupo do amine e convertendo o 
primeiramente à amônia e então ao urea através do ciclo do 
ornithine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come gli amminoacidi 
sono deaminated, rimuovendo il gruppo dell'ammina e convertendolo in 
primo luogo in ammoniaca ed allora in urea durante il ciclo 
dell'ornitina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα αμινοξέα είναι,
αφαιρώντας την ομάδα αμινών και μετατρέποντας την πρώτα στην 
αμμωνία και έπειτα στην ουρία μέσω του ornithine κύκλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo son los 
aminoácidos deaminated, quitando el grupo de la amina y 
convirtiéndolo primero al amoníaco y entonces a la urea durante el 
ciclo del ornithine.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aminosäuren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ammoniak</string>
          </keyword>
